metadata.dc:author: Moncho Vasallo, Joaquin
metadata.dc:description: The author, leaving aside his development as a statistician, opens up to other proposals, reviewing some studies about qualitative research methodology as related to health sciences. He concludes that qualitative research complements quantitative research and that a subjective element exists in both: numbers are also words because behind numbers there is a reflexive process and a human interpretation.
metadata.dc:title: El número también es palabra.
[Numbers are also words].
